com.stabilit.sc.registry
Class ServiceRegistryItemPool

java.lang.Object
  com.stabilit.sc.util.MapBean<java.lang.String>
      com.stabilit.sc.registry.ServiceRegistryItemPool

public class ServiceRegistryItemPool
extends com.stabilit.sc.util.MapBean<java.lang.String>

The Class ServiceRegistryItemPool. Pools incoming request for one service. It depends on service resource and type how pooling is managed.

Author:
JTraber
